name: The Murder Express (ShadowBand)
description:
"The Murder Express" (2019) the HD remake of an older "who-dunnit?" clue style game that takes place on a train. Mr. Duval has been murdered and it's up to the inspector to crack the case without getting killed in the process! The game generates a random crime each time so each playthrough is unique.

Can you survive a ride on the murder express?
